verse.name: v1
verse.lines: One thing I know that I have found newline Through all the troubles that surround newline You are the Rock that never fails, you never fail.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: One thing I know, that I believe newline Through every blessing I receive newline You are the only one that stays, You always stay

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: You never change, You're still the same newline You are the everlasting God newline You will remain after the day is gone newline And the things of earth have passed newline Everlasting God.
